channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Joe Biden Privately Expresses Doubts About Whether He Can Win a Second Term
Biden's struggle to remember key Cabinet official’s name left allies 'shaken up': report
item.description: A moment last month, when President Biden stumbled over the name of Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas, reportedly left some allies unnerved.

item.title: NY Times: Biden Weighs Whether to Continue in Race; WH Denies
item.description: President Joe Biden confided to a key ally that he must quickly convince voters he is able to perform his chief-executive duties or he may not be able to continue his campaign for reelection, The New York Times reported Wednesday.

item.title: Botched Robbery at Fashion Island in Newport Beach, CA Leaves an Elderly Woman Dead
Biden campaign sends all-staff memo hoping to calm post-debate concerns
item.description: President Biden’s campaign on Wednesday sent out a fresh all-staff memo in an attempt to calm concerns about his chances of being re-elected following last week’s heavily criticized debate performance.

item.title: Sabato's Crystal Ball: Michigan Now a Toss-Up State
item.description: Nonpartisan election handicapper Sabato's Crystal Ball at the University of Virginia Center for Politics says two key Midwestern states are moving away from President Joe Biden post-debate, The Hill reported.

item.title: New Poll Shows Michelle Obama Defeating Trump as Biden Alternative
WH responds to report Biden told ally he's weighing dropping out of race
item.description: President Biden is considering whether he should continue on as the Democratic presidential nominee following his disastrous debate performance, The New York Times reported.

item.title: Expert: Biden Struggling Among Key Religious Groups
item.description: President Joe Biden's less-than-ideal approval ratings among Christian groups could spell trouble for his reelection aspirations, according to one respected religion analyst.

item.title: Brutal Leaked Internal Polling for Biden Shows Just How Badly the Debate Damaged Him
Newsom heads east for meeting with Biden as president tries to keep his campaign from heading south
item.description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom, a top Biden campaign surrogate, will join other Democrat governors on Wednesday in a meeting with the president following fallout from last week's debate with Trump

item.title: Biden Campaign to Staff: Race Remains Close
item.description: Internal polling shows the Biden-Trump race remains tight despite President Joe Biden's debate performance, according to the president's reelection campaign.

item.title: Looks Like James Clyburn Wants Biden Gone, Too: Democrat Kingmaker to 'Tell Him What I Really Feel'
Michelle Obama leads Biden, Harris in matchup against Trump in latest post-debate poll
item.description: Former first lady Michelle Obama is only candidate to beat former President Trump in a hypothetical 2024 matchup, a new post-debate poll found.

item.title: Gov. Sununu to Newsmax: NH Voters 'Ticked Off' They've Been Lied to About Biden
item.description: New Hampshire Gov. Chris Sununu told Newsmax on Wednesday that a new Saint Anselm College poll showing that the Granite State is in play for presumptive GOP presidential nominee Donald Trump reflects what he's seeing on the ground "without a doubt."
